short.ar: Instagram Auto Message Sender، إرسال رسالة مباشرة جماعية إلى متابعي المنافس.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Instagram Automation DM tool, Send mass DM (direct message) to competitor's followers and anyone you want.
short.de: Instagram-Automatisierung, Massen-DM (Direktnachricht) an die Follower der Konkurrenz senden.
short.es: Automatización de Instagram, envío masivo de DM (mensaje directo) a los seguidores de la competencia.
short.fr: Instagram Automation, Envoyez un DM de masse (message direct) aux abonnés du concurrent.
short.it: Automazione di Instagram, invia un DM di massa (messaggio diretto) ai follower della concorrenza.
short.ja: Instagram 自動化、競合他社のフォロワーに大量の DM (ダイレクト メッセージ) を送信します。
short.ko: Instagram 자동화, 경쟁자의 팔로워에게 대량 DM(다이렉트 메시지)을 보냅니다.
short.ru: Автоматизация Instagram, отправляйте массовые DM (прямые сообщения) подписчикам конкурентов.
short.sv: Instagram Automation, Skicka mass-DM (direktmeddelande) till konkurrentens följare.
short.vi: Tự động hóa Instagram, Gửi DM hàng loạt (tin nhắn trực tiếp) tới những người theo dõi đối thủ cạnh tranh.
short.zh_CN: Instagram 批量私信机器人，向竞争对手的关注者发送大量DM消息。

long.ar,de,es,fr,it,ja,ko,ru,sv,vi:
The powerful Instagram bulk message sender, Send text messages, and images without banned.
IG DM Sender (aka IG DM Bot🚀) is the best IG Automation Tool with funnel filter.

Use IG DM Sender to connect with your customers by sending bulk messages.
Grow your business with IG DM Sender has never been easier.

🔥 Upgrade
✓ Save sending history to local storage
✓ Continue task progress from history
✓ Add blacklist in the settings page

# FEATURES

✓ Auto Mass Send Messages for IG.
✓ One click to Send bulk, customized messages automatically.
✓ Send by user's followers / following.
✓ Send by hashtag / location.
✓ Send by post's commenters and likers.
✓ Send by specific user list.
✓ Send text message, image message.
✓ Personalized messages with placeholders & spin syntax template.
✓ Message Template
✓ Funnel filter, Avoid duplicate send by filter all success history or specific history.
✓ Automatically save sending result to history, download success and fail list.
✓ Smart Error Handling for 403, 429, and 400 error message

Kindly do not use for SPAMMING which is Instagram strictly prohibited.

# FAQ
https://igdm.extensionsfox.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.

# DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.

# STATEMENT
INSTAGRAM is a trademark of Instagram, LLC. IG DM Sender is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to INSTAGRAM, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

Improve send image feature

# v3.0.0 change log
Fixed the 403 issue, you can send messages better now.

# v2.2.0 change log
🎯 Add Filter feature
You can narrow down who you want to target with the following filters: Followers, Following, Following, Posts, Is Private, Is Verified, Is Business, Is Blank Avatar, Is Recent Joined Accounts.

# v2.1.4 change log
Fixed an issue with occasional duplication when using hashtags

# v2.1.3 change log
Add auto pilot feature - you can set daily limit, set and forget
Fix the custom list critical bug
Fix fetch post's likers issue

long.zh_CN:
功能强大的Instagram批量消息发送者，发送短信和图像未被禁止。
IG DM发件人（又名IG DMBot🚀）是带有漏斗过滤器的Instagram自动化工具。

使用IG DM发送者通过发送批量消息来与客户连接。
通过IG DM发送者发展业务从未如此简单。

＃ 特征

✓自动质量发送Instagram消息。
✓一键单击以自动发送散装，自定义，Instagram消息。
✓由用户的关注者发送 /关注者。
✓通过标签 /位置发送。
✓通过Post的评论者和成绩发送。
✓通过特定用户列表发送。
✓发送短信，图像消息。
✓带有占位符和语法模板的个性化消息。
✓漏斗过滤器，避免通过过滤器复制发送所有成功历史记录或特定历史记录。
✓自动将发送结果保存到历史记录，下载成功和失败列表。
✓403、429和400错误消息的智能错误处理

请不要严格禁止Instagram的垃圾邮件。

＃ 常问问题
https://igdm.extensionsfox.com/#faq
如果您有任何疑问，请通过help@extensionsfox.com保持联系。

＃数据隐私
所有数据均在您的本地计算机中处理，从未通过我们的Web服务器，没有人知道您导出了什么。

＃ 陈述
Instagram是Instagram，LLC的商标。 IG DM发件人与Instagram，Inc。或其任何分支机构或子公司没有隶属于，认可，赞助或其他相关。
